title: Dad ‘in tears’ after gang of bullies stamp on son’s head 'holding hammer and BB gun'
text:

A father burst into tears as he watched footage of a gang of children attacking his son while 'wielding a BB gun and a hammer.'

Footage shows a 12 year-old child curled up in a ball and clutching his head as he is stamped on by a group.

The boy's father, who wanted to remain anonymous said his boy came home ‘a bit shook up’ on Saturday afternoon and said he’d got in a fight.

He said his son had a suffered "a few bruises and bumps on his head"

He told Metro: "We said to him just be careful when you’re out and about, but then the next day the people who did it put the video on social media.

(Image: Deadline News)

"My son showed the video to me and my wife and as soon as I saw it I cried.

"You never expect any dad to see that."

Police have arrested four individuals in connection with the assault which took place on Saturday in Leicester.

Footage of the incident was posted to Twitter yesterday by the page ‘London Knife Crime Ldn.’

The video shows a gang of youths walking in a park appearing to threaten another boy.

(Image: Deadline News)

One of the youths can be seen raising his arm with an object in his hand, which police later said was a BB gun.

The boy is then pushed to the ground and he is stomped on repeatedly.

Another youth can be seen holding an unknown object as he kicks the boys head.

Another child then walks away from the scene stuffing a hammer under his top and another youth can be seen brandishing a pistol by his side.

(Image: Deadline News)

A police spokeswoman said: "Leicestershire Police received a report of an assault on a 12-year-old boy in the area of Beaumont Walk, Leicester, on Saturday afternoon (5 October).

"It was reported the boy had been assaulted by a number of other youths in the incident which happened sometime between 3.30pm and 4pm.

"One of the youths was reported to be in possession of what is believed to be a hammer and another youth was holding a BB gun at the time of the incident.

"The victim of the assault was reported to have suffered injuries including bruising.

(Image: Deadline News)

"We are also aware of a video which has been posted on social media in relation to this assault.

"Four boys – three aged 13 and one aged 14 - have been arrested on suspicion of assault in connection with the incident. They have since been released on police bail.

"A BB gun believed to be used during the incident has since been recovered.

"Our enquiries remain ongoing following the report and police continue to carry out proactive patrols in the area.

"We urge anyone with any information in relation to the incident to contact police quoting incident 19000535709.

(Image: Deadline News)

"We would like to reassure the local community that we are working closely with parents and schools. However, if you have any questions or concerns, I would also urge you to make contact with your local officers."

Scores of people have commented on the video on Twitter, with one writing: “Oh my god. The stamps and kicks to the head, no remorse and a hammer?"

Another wrote: “Sickening. I hope the child is ok and the attackers arrested!”

And another added: “Made my blood run cold. Beyond feral… and I’m beyond words.”
description: The dad was horrified when he saw footage of his 12 year-old son curled up in a ball and clutching his head as he is stamped on by a group
